SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Cashier
A class that connects to a PostgreSQL database and retrieves drink names from the menuitem_db table.
DailySalesPanel
A panel that allows managers to query and display sales data for a specific date.
dbSetup
A utility class that contains database connection configuration constants.
DrinkCustomizationPanel
The DrinkCustomizationPanel class provides a graphical interface for customizing drinks.
DrinkIngredientsManager
Manages the ingredients for drinks in a bubble tea shop application.
DrinkListPanel
A panel that displays the list of available drinks from the database.
HourlySalesPanel
A panel that displays hourly sales statistics in a bar chart format.
InventoryPanel
A panel that displays the current inventory status from the database.
InventoryStatusPanel
The InventoryStatusPanel class provides a graphical user interface for monitoring inventory status.
MainGUI
The main GUI for the Bubble Tea Shop POS System that provides the cashier interface.
Manager
The Manager class provides an administrative interface for the Bubble Tea Shop system.
OrderStatsPanel
A panel that displays a list of all orders from the database.
OrderSummaryPanel
A panel that displays the current order summary, calculates the total amount, and provides functionality for checkout and clearing the order.
ProductUsageChart
A panel that displays a bar chart showing ingredient usage over a specified date range.
UnifiedGUI
A unified GUI application that provides a switchable interface between the cashier and manager views.
XReportPanel
A panel that generates and displays X Reports for the current day's sales activities.
ZReportPanel
A panel that allows managers to generate and view Z Reports for daily sales.
